name: Inverted Fate-Fallen Crown
description:
DESC FROM SCRACTH 

UNDERTALE by Toby Fox
INVERTED FATE AU by Dorked
More credits in-game

This is a port made for more accessibility.
The Gamejolt HTML build is more recommended, which can be found here: https://gamejolt.com/games/FallenCrown/567808
(Russian translation included!)

PLEASE do not post advertisements or passwords in the comments. Your posts will be deleted immediately.

--UPDATE LOG (SPOILERS)--
* Box perimeters have been fixed.
* Invisible wall removed.
* Arm cannon directions now functional
* Dialogue letters are no longer draggable
